```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
DY_ICD <- read_excel("DY_ICD10_Classifications.xlsx")

```
pivoting
```{r}

DY_ICD <- read_excel("DY_ICD10_Classifications.xlsx")
ICD_names <- DY_ICD %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    everything(),
    cols_vary = "slowest",
    names_to = "category",
    values_to = "dx",
    values_drop_na = TRUE
  ) %>% 
  relocate(dx, .before = category)

```



```{r}
yes_no_var <-function(.data, z){
 a <- .data %>%  select(pat_enc_csn_id, z) %>% filter(!is.na(z)) %>% distinct()

  return(a)
}
  
  
```

```{r}
abc <-C_F_Trauma_dxcat %>%  yes_no_var("Etoh")
```
